ghost: listen, guy. we don't need more unnecessary deaths here, so it's 
really best that you just speak u on what just went down here. azure is 
fairly unhapy about this stabbing buisiness, and goth already has both 
triggers pressed halfway down. your optics so much as twitch and his already 
paper-thin patience snaps. you need to give us answers and you need to give 
them now.

he hoped that the good cop/bad cop routine would shake some talk out of the 
mystery bot. he knew azure was on edge, so that was no gamble, but goth was 
completely unpredictable when aggrivated. he was liable to be pulling the 
triggers as ghost talked, so the mystery bot was possibly dead whether he 
talked or not.

OOC: for the love of god, please talk!

--part1_cf.121d7f68.298b6100_boundary
